Articles.Content:
Its a dang simple design, yet i managed to orbit the sun with it. Ha. Such a small ship, became a sattelite of the Sun. Anyways, heres a little video of it.

http://youtu.be/ZCNLo4WwyPE

P.S. I just didnt know where to post this, it is more for the orbiting around the sun thingy.
It\'s OK, but you should post your ship (.craft file)
